Desc.entry: Anglican church. Grade 1 listed building. Founded 1109, present building c.1480. Holds an arts and crafts festival at Easter and a music festival in June. Ploughmans lunches in November.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Sunday Services at 10.30am, 1st & 3rd Sun in the month (Book of Common Prayer Holy Communion), 2nd & 5th Sun in the month (Common Worship Holy Communion), 4th Sun in the month (Choral Mattins), Sunday Evening Services at 6.30pm, 1st, 2nd, 3rd & 5th Sun in the month (Choral BCP Evensongs), 4th Sun in the month (Common Worship Holy Communion); Friday evening (Change Ringers), Tuesday evening (Hand Bells), Church open Mon-Sun 9am-5pm (or dusk if sooner)
